I love the brand Cerave. They make great skin products. This sunscreen is SPF 50 which is a good SPF level. The ingredients are titanium and zinc which are really good. It is a mineral sunscreen which means it is more of a natural product and healthier for you than chemical sunscreen. It also has 3 essential ceramides and niacinamides which are ingredients to promote healthy skin and restore its natural barrier. It won't clog your pores.  It is accepted by the national eczema association. It is not greasy nor does it have a strong scent. The 2.5 ounce is a good size sunscreen. Not too big or small. The thing I don't like about this product is that it is hard to rub in and does leave you with a white complexion. I hope they improve on the consistency and color. Also
column2: it does not say that it is waterproof. I hope they make a waterproof version for the beach or for when you sweat. Overall
column3: this is a great product in that it has many health benefits but it needs to be fine tuned to be an even better product.
